slides.headerLeft: One in 26 people will develop epilepsy in their lifetime.
slides.headerRight: That's 65 Million people who desperately need a cure.
slides.upperMainHeader:
Lauren needs a cure

Her first seizure was at seven months. Now 35, Lauren hasn't lived a single day independently.
